summary: The diff shows only metadata file changes (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json) with no actual code modifications to frontend/src/main.tsx or any provider components. Both REQ-4 and REQ-5 require changes to the main.tsx entry point to wrap the App component with AuthProvider in the correct hierarchy, but no such changes are evident in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure AuthProvider from frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx properly wraps the App component in frontend/src/main.tsx with correct nesting order: QueryClientProvider > InternetIdentityProvider > AuthProvider > App
missing_requirements.reason: No modifications to frontend/src/main.tsx are shown in the diff. The diff only contains changes to metadata files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json), with no actual code changes to implement the required component hierarchy.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify that the AuthProvider wrapper persists through the production build process and is not stripped or reordered during bundling
missing_requirements.reason: No build configuration changes, bundler settings modifications, or AuthProvider implementation changes are present in the diff to address production build persistence concerns.
